title: WATCH: Dramatic rescue of Indonesian maid who threatened to jump down Bukit Panjang HDB block

organizations.name: sgt like coconuts sg on facebook us follow coconuts sg

text:
WATCH: Dramatic rescue of Indonesian maid who threatened to jump down Bukit Panjang HDB block By Coconuts Singapore February 10, 2017 / 11:35 SGT Like Coconuts SG on Facebook us Follow Coconuts SG on Twitter us Follow 
Photo: Video screengrab 0 
A tense situation broke out yesterday afternoon in Bukit Panjang, where a domestic worker stood on a HDB common corridor ledge and threatened to jump down. It's unclear from which storey, but it looks high enough to at least incapacitate her at least. 
According to footage uploaded on the All Singapore Stuff Facebook page, the Indonesian lady had to be coaxed and reassured that she would be able to return back to her home country. Unbeknownst to her, the conversation was a ruse to let Singapore Civil Defence Force (SCDF) officers get into a hidden position before they grabbed her back to safety. As you can see, the suicidal lady wasn't too pleased about getting rescued. 
Whatever the outcome of the investigations, hopefully the distressed maid gets to return back to her homeland. How distressed must she have been to climb out onto the ledge?
